reporter_caption.center: EQUITABLE LIFE ASSU. SOCY. OF THE U.S. v. HIGGINS, 223 App. Div. 718 (1928)

caption.center: THE EQUITABLE LIFE ASSURANCE SOCIETY OF THE UNITED STATES v. NELLIE HIGGING

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, First Department.

opinion.opinion_text:
Motion for leave to appeal or for reargumentPage 719 denied, with ten dollars costs. Motion for stay pending the granting or final refusal by the Court of Appeals of leave to appeal to that court granted upon appellant's filing the undertaking required by section 593 of the Civil Practice Act.
Present — Martin, Merrell, O'Malley and Proskauer, JJ.
